programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Sins Of The Father
programme.desc: This crime thriller mystery drama sheds light on the plight of scam victims, and is centred around a man named Samuel, whose life is shattered by a scam involving his father.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 8
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Isa, Dalawa, Tatlo, Ang Tatay Kong Kalbo
programme.desc: Medel (Bembol Roco) is a pretty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who need it. But hid felonious activities stop when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Niño Mulach).

programme.title: Kakampi Ko Ang Diyos
programme.desc: A friend entrusted Ronnie with an image of the Infant Jesus. Unknown to him, the image contained papers which would endanger the country.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Pitong Gamol
programme.desc: They are uneducated but smart. They are orphans but the whole neighborhood is their family. Life treats them harshly but they survive.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Nating Hagkan Ang Nakaraan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Helen looks like a woman who has everything anybody could want-a beautiful house, a loving husband, and a baby on the way.

programme.title: Kolehiyala
programme.desc: Three girls in their first year of college face varied but equally difficult problems. They lead their lives very different from the country's perception of the \"kolehiyala\" as a young, innocent girl.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Tondo, where gangs proliferate and crime is a way of life. This is the home of Willie Cuevas, who made his living doing the dirty work for a corrupt law enforcer.

programme.title: Sa Kabila Ng Lahat
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie was a famous television commentator whose work was focused on social issues particularly corruption in the government. However, because she was having an affair with a politician, who was helping her further her career, she turned a blind eye to his own evil deeds.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Titser's Enemi No. 1
programme.desc: The four members of the notorious campus gang, D'titser's enemy, were busy playing their bad jokes again on everybody. Their favorite victims were their teachers, who got the lions' share of the gangs' pranks.

programme.title: Oscar Ramos, Hitman
programme.desc: Oscar Ramos (Ramon Revilla) is a respected man in the community. He settles disputes and takes up the cudgels for the oppressed. He also has a secret -- an amulet that protects him from bullets. Will his amulet protect him when both the police and Ka Ernie's group hunt him down?

programme.title: Mahirap Maging Pogi (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Perding Pogi (Andrew E.) is sought after by every woman in their neighborhood. Running away from all the girls who are dying to be his wife, he decides to look for his cousin Dodong Boogie (Dennis Padilla) in Manila.

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Ang Mamatay Nang Dahil Sa Iyo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo characterizes a patriotic soldier whose amor patria runs curdling in his veins. His ideologies led him to a clash of opinions with his younger brother.

programme.title: Kumander Bawang
programme.desc: Herbert Bautista comes from a family of vampire killers. The male heirs reek with the stench of garlic and are endowed with super powers. There is a need for Kumander Bawang and is off to fight the vampire.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Topo-Topo Barega
programme.desc: \"Topo Topo Barega\", an expression meaning \"All for one, One for all.\" What each earns individually becomes the money of all. The problem of one worries the rest.

programme.title: Sa Isang Sulok Ng Mga Pangarap
programme.desc: Alice Dixson turned in two powerful performances as the young woman forced into plastic surgery and as the wife she was made to resemble who got hold of her husband's (Ariel Rivera) money and then ran off with her lover.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Parañaque Bank Robbery
programme.desc: There was a robbery in the bank where Joselito Joseco was employed and having adapted the guts and bravery of his idol, he was able to save the loot and shoot down the robbers.
